context_bundle.summary: Change Management for automation: Communication phases (Awareness -> Education -> Adoption). Address fears: job elimination (emphasize augmentation), trust (demo reliability), complexity (training), status quo (show benefits), failure (establish support). Celebrate early adopters, share metrics, recognize contributions.

onboarding.quick_start: 1. Announce vision + benefits. 2. Train on new processes. 3. Celebrate adopters, share wins. Common fears: 'Will eliminate my job' -> 'Augments, frees you for strategic work'
common_patterns: Fear: Job elimination -> Response: Augmentation not replacement
Fear: Don't trust automation -> Response: Demo reliability + controls
Fear: Too complicated -> Response: Training + support
Fear: Always done it this way -> Response: Tangible personal benefits
known_errors: No quick wins communicated = no momentum
